title: Online Intensive Training on Safe Use of Sit-Stand Workstations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer/smartphone proficiency and general comprehension of workplace environment improvement
context.additional_context: Optimized smartphone-based engagement, considering digital accessibility for learners aged 40+

learning_goals: Learners can explain the correct installation method for sit-stand workstations with 80% accuracy within one week
Learners can identify three or more biomechanical risk factors when using workstations and propose improvement measures
Learners can create a personalized action plan for workplace improvements within one month of completing the training

resources: One-Page Behavioral Guide in PDF Format
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
